alert.note: Alert for Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wibaux, southeastern Dawson and southeastern Richland Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wibaux, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wibaux, Saint Phillip and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northeastern Montana.
